channel.title: Stories on Alex Dunn has no idea what he's doing

item.title: Sacrifices
item.description: A hip new version of Judith Jarvis Thomson’s violinist thought experiment. Maybe a little more realistic. But probably no more convincing.

item.title: Mr. Smith Goes to the Hospital
item.description: A super sad story about Bernard Williams and utilitarianism. The moral is that you really just shouldn’t bother visiting your friend in the hospital.
